config.name: Zabbix Hosts | CPU Load | Top 5

thresholdConfig.metricDescription: Source: ZabbixStats, Metric: avg(CPU Load), Recurrent: Every week (28 Days ago), Time shift: 7d

hideTooMuchData.message: To protect the browser performance, a limit of output records has been imposed on the widget. Please apply filters or narrow down the analysed time frame to display the results.

queries.nql: (valInColl(ip, "65b0f9b1-3a9e190d-296b4603_0_ip_bucket-limit", "ip") OR ip = null) | timeAggr avgCpu_load=avg(cpu_load) on timestamp by ip as ip interval="${AUTOBUCKET_INTERVAL}" dir="desc" unwind=true bucketAlias="srcEventTimestamp" | limit 1000

subpipes.nql: ${LIMIT_SOURCE} | neq(null, ip) | aggr avgCpu_load=avg(cpu_load) by ip as ip unwind=true | sort avgCpu_load desc | limit 5 | dst "65b0f9b1-3a9e190d-296b4603_0_ip_bucket-limit"

queries.nql: gte(mod(sub(timestamp, ${TIMERANGE_TO}), 86400000), -${TIMERANGE_IN_MS_PLACEHOLDER}) AND lte(mod(sub(timestamp, ${TIMERANGE_TO}), 86400000), mul(${TIMERANGE_IN_MS_PLACEHOLDER}, 0.3)) | eq(isWorkingDay(timestamp), isWorkingDay(${TIMERANGE_TO})) | (valInColl(ip, "65b0f9b1-3a9e190d-296b4603_baseline_0_ip_bucket-limit", "ip") OR ip = null) | timeAggr avgCpu_load0baseline=avg(cpu_load) on timestamp by ip as ip interval="${AUTOBUCKET_INTERVAL}" dir="desc" unwind=true bucketAlias="srcEventTimestamp" | set srcEventTimestamp = add(mod(sub(srcEventTimestamp, ${TIMERANGE_TO}), 86400000), ${TIMERANGE_TO}) | timeAggr avgCpu_load0baselineavg=avg(avgCpu_load0baseline) on srcEventTimestamp interval="${AUTOBUCKET_INTERVAL}" dir="desc" unwind=true bucketAlias="srcEventTimestamp" | set avgCpu_load0baselineUp = mul(1.3, avgCpu_load0baselineavg), avgCpu_load0baselineDown = mul(0.7, avgCpu_load0baselineavg)

subpipes.nql: ${LIMIT_SOURCE} | neq(null, ip) | aggr avgCpu_load=avg(cpu_load) by ip as ip unwind=true | sort avgCpu_load desc | limit 5 | dst "65b0f9b1-3a9e190d-296b4603_baseline_0_ip_bucket-limit"

queries.nql: gte(mod(sub(timestamp, ${TIMERANGE_TO}), 604800000), -${TIMERANGE_IN_MS_PLACEHOLDER}) AND lte(mod(sub(timestamp, ${TIMERANGE_TO}), 604800000), mul(${TIMERANGE_IN_MS_PLACEHOLDER}, 0.3)) | (valInColl(ip, "65b0f9b1-3a9e190d-296b4603_baseline_1_ip_bucket-limit", "ip") OR ip = null) | timeAggr avgCpu_load1baseline=avg(cpu_load) on timestamp by ip as ip interval="${AUTOBUCKET_INTERVAL}" dir="desc" unwind=true bucketAlias="srcEventTimestamp" | set srcEventTimestamp = add(mod(sub(srcEventTimestamp, ${TIMERANGE_TO}), 604800000), ${TIMERANGE_TO}) | timeAggr avgCpu_load1baselineavg=avg(avgCpu_load1baseline) on srcEventTimestamp interval="${AUTOBUCKET_INTERVAL}" dir="desc" unwind=true bucketAlias="srcEventTimestamp" | set avgCpu_load1baselineUp = mul(1.3, avgCpu_load1baselineavg), avgCpu_load1baselineDown = mul(0.7, avgCpu_load1baselineavg)

subpipes.nql: ${LIMIT_SOURCE} | neq(null, ip) | aggr avgCpu_load=avg(cpu_load) by ip as ip unwind=true | sort avgCpu_load desc | limit 5 | dst "65b0f9b1-3a9e190d-296b4603_baseline_1_ip_bucket-limit"

config.name: Zabbix Hosts - KPI [All IPs] - ICMP Items

queries.nql: response_time != null | aggr dcIp=dc(ip) unwind=true | limit 1000
